name: Alex Johnson
summary: Full-stack Software Engineer with 5+ years of experience building scalable web applications and cloud-native solutions. Passionate about clean code, agile methodologies, and mentoring junior developers. Strong background in both frontend and backend technologies with a focus on delivering high-quality, user-centric products.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
bullets: Led development of microservices architecture serving 2M+ daily active users.
Reduced API response time by 40% through database optimization and caching strategies.
Mentored team of 5 junior developers, conducting code reviews and technical training sessions.
Implemented CI/CD pipelines reducing deployment time from 2 hours to 15 minutes.

experience.title: Software Engineer
bullets: Built real-time collaboration features using WebSockets, increasing user engagement by 35%.
Developed RESTful APIs handling 100K+ requests per minute with 99.9% uptime.
Collaborated with product and design teams to deliver features on tight deadlines.

projects.name: TaskFlow
bullets: Built with React, Node.js, and PostgreSQL with 500+ GitHub stars.
Implemented drag-and-drop Kanban boards with real-time sync across devices.
Deployed on AWS with auto-scaling handling 10K+ concurrent users.

projects.name: WeatherAPI
bullets: Created RESTful API aggregating data from multiple weather sources.
Achieved 99.95% uptime with Redis caching and rate limiting.
Documented with OpenAPI specification, serving 50+ third-party integrations.
